title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description:
Bug 12398 Accessibility problems. Currently, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).

Observed Behavior (OB): When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not actually do anything.

Expected Behavior (EB): The Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.

Steps to Reproduce (SR): 
1. Launch the application on Windows 2000.
2. Open the Help view.
3. Press the tab key to navigate through the elements.
